description:
Everyone at Inspiration Academy is excited for their day off and making plans for dates and fun.  Takuto decides to go to town with Ritsu, but ends up going with Fukune instead.  Taketo is excited by the innocent and defenseless Fukune.  And then it starts raining suddenly, and Taketo and Fukune have to take refuge in a hotel! Taketo`s excitement reaches its peak as she takes a shower and changes...  What will happen to them, and what secret will Fukune tell?
Source: crunchyroll
